title: Incremental compilation failure on build

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
It looks like `predicates_of` is listed in the table in the issue, but both the compiler and #84970 say to report it, so here it is! I don't have a minimal example to reproduce this, but I'll drop in the error. If this isn't helpful at all, feel free to close! ### Code Nothing to provide here. This happened when compiling [Bindle](https://github.com/deislabs/bindle) for reference ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.54.0 (a178d0322 2021-07-26) binary: rustc commit-hash: a178d0322ce20e33eac124758e837cbd80a6f633 commit-date: 2021-07-26 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.54.0 LLVM version: 12.0.1 ``` ### Error output Command I ran: ``` cargo run --features cli --bin bindle-server -- --directory /Users//.bindle/bindles-embedded --address 127.0.0.1:8080 --use-embedded-db ``` ``` Compiling bindle v0.4.1 (/Users//Documents/code/bindle) error: internal compiler error: encountered incremental compilation error with predicates_of(bindle[e836]::authn::Authenticator) | = help: This is a known issue with the compiler. Run `cargo clean -p bindle_server` or `cargo clean` to allow your project to compile = note: Please follow the instructions below to create a bug report with the provided information = note: See for more information thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Found unstable fingerprints for predicates_of(bindle[e836]::authn::Authenticator): GenericPredicates { parent: None, predicates: [(Binder(TraitPredicate(), []), /Users//Documents/code/bindle/src/authn/mod.rs:11:1: 35:2 (#0))] }', /rustc/a178d0322ce20e33eac124758e837cbd80a6f633/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/query/plumbing.rs:620:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.54.0 (a178d0322 2021-07-26) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [predicates_of] computing predicates of `bindle::authn::Authenticator` #1 [param_env] computing normalized predicates of `bindle::authn::Authenticator::auth_url` end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error error: could not compile `bindle` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. make: *** [_run] Error 101 ``` I couldn't get a backtrace as the error only occurred once:
Backtrace

``` ```
